DialogueText.Text: Ugh... Still need a few more coins before I can get that new bow it seems. What to do; what to do?
I wonder what job I should do...?
I guess, but god, those Bishops can just be the worst. It seems like I can never make their damn food quick enough...
Oh no, anything but that! Last time I was in there it felt like my fingers were gonna fall off! I can't make another robe... I can't!!
I guess I can wait around for another one of those, but they're such a bore. I don't know if I can stay awake through another one.
